title: Lynda - Communication in the 21st Century Classroom
description:
Lynda - Communication in the 21st Century Classroom

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

2h 5m Beginner Dec 21, 2015  | Uploaded in Dec 25, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject: Education + Elearning 
Author: Oliver Schinkten 
 
Communication is critical to student success. A variety of technology tools available to 21st century educators expand your ability to give students fast and effective feedback, saving classroom time and accelerating student achievement. Throughout this course, Oliver Schinkten explores how teachers can use Internet-based tools such as video and audio conferencing, learning management systems, and social media to communicate more effectively with students, parents, and other educators. In addition to covering basic theories of communication, Oliver also gives power tips for essential collaboration tools like Google Drive, Gmail, Google Hangouts, Collaborize Classroom, and more.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Introducing digital literacy to your class
	â€¢	Understanding our digital citizenship and digital footprint
	â€¢	Collaborating with Google Drive
	â€¢	Implementing an LMS
	â€¢	Offering video office hours using Google Hangouts
	â€¢	Gathering student feedback with Google Forms
	â€¢	Creating audio and video announcements
	â€¢	Using social media to communicate with the community
